comment.body: Hey @Maomihz! I was just going through the feed on ZeroMe and I recognised your username. I notice you still have me added (Scrub), but that account is no longer active due to me not having my private key for it after I lost all my data on my HDD. :c

I've noticed that my username isn't 'ScrubTheSecond', but rather 'Scrubthesecond' when I make a reply here. Also, can you please add a 'Send' button when replying instead of pressing enter? Thanks! ^-^
Another thing, can you make following chats opt-in? I have to keep going through all the chats to stop following them.
Do you want to go to college? If not, do you _really_ need to go to college to live your life?
@ZAlex: What topics are you good at? Also, does it cost money to go to college?
Btw, you and I seem to have a similar mindset. (I'm reading your description)
@ZAlex: Yeah, that's what I mean. Also, I'm currently in college in Australia doing programming. I got to go for free. I love socialism. :3

@ZAlex: Oh, so it's not nation-wide? Australia's isn't exactly either. I live in New South Wales (Australian state) and the NSW state government pays the entire fees if I'm on Centerlink (social service, I get about 280AUD every two weeks, which isn't much), which I am.

P.S. I wouldn't listen to your teacher. I'm am also pacifist and anti-militaristic and that's a good thing! Non-violence should be one of our main values, but of course I'm not going to force my values on others, but rather express my opinion to others.

@ZAlex: I only do well in programming. All other topics I failed at (Maths, English, Science, Geography and Modern History... I love Maths, Science and Geography, I just wasn't too good at them... :3 ), but I no longer need to care about them as I am not a high school student anymore. Also with your latest post, Australia is going down that path too with the Liberals and Nationals being in government. :c
@Nextbit: That doesn't mean we should leave it as it is if we know for a fact that people are suffering due to it.
I would _LOVE_ to have a Reddit clone on ZeroNet.
Prism Break: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AsRLpuRxr3pb9p3TKoMXPSWHzh6i7fMGi/en.tar.gz/index.html
Congratulations! :D
Hello, Lightrabbit!
@Lightrabbit: Welcome to ZeroNet! What brings you here? c:

@光速兔: Nice to hear. Please mail me [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=scrubthesecond) when you've created the site so I can seed it! :D
P.S. Your English is fine. I can't even speak Chinese, so... :c
Hello! ^-^

Aww, thank you Miuli! I will pass on this message! ^-^
唉，谢谢你三里！ 我会传递这个消息！^ - ^

Do you use GNU/Linux? That theme looks familiar. 
你使用GNU / Linux吗？ 那个主题看起来很熟悉

@美酒情暖月: Hello, Miu Li! Meow~ :3
你好，缪丽！喵〜 :3

Automation will take away most jobs in our lifetimes anyway.
无论如何，自动化将消除我们生命中的大部分工作。

@A7ic7: Ah, alright.
啊，好的
Can you please remove the auto-follow feature? I don't like or comment much anymore because as soon as I do that, I start following what I commented on, which is not what I want. Thanks.
